item.title: PAPIIT TA100520: Authorship analysis on documents with deep learning techniques.
Lexical resource for data processing of social networks
item.description: Lexical resource for data processing of social networks” summary: “The aim of the project is the collection of dictionaries of slang words, contractions, abbreviations and emoticons commonly used in social media. The diccitionaries are in English, Spanish, Dutch, and Italian languages.

item.title: Spanish NewsCorpus: Multi-tagged corpus for authorship analysis in Spanish
item.description: The aim of the project is the compilation of news in Spanish from digital media sites and its categorization into three areas: variation of Spanish, author, and author’s gender. The collection was carried out semi-automatically with a web crawler developed for this purpose.
